talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>No, "voe." With a V!<sp:5:0:0> Bite your lower lip
when you say it! "Voe"!<sp:5:1:0>

<clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0a00><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>I have had to explain this so many times since I
became a guard...<sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:0000>Voe<clr:ffff> means "<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo.
Talk_PreChallenge07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If someone had asked what I thought I'd
be doing today, "opening the door for
a voe" would not have made the list...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? I thought we talked about this. Did
you forget already?

<clr:0000>Voe<clr:ffff> means "<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo.
Talk_InKarakara:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's the <clr:0000>voe <clr:ffff>the chief gave special
permission to. <sp:5:0:0>Of course I'll open the
door for you, but...
You should know that Buliara isn't here
right now. She left for <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>
some time ago.
Talk_InBattle:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I have to protect the people of the town
from danger!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You can't be serious.<sp:5:1:0> Do you really think I
would open the door for the likes of you?

Get out of my sight!
Talk_InKarakara_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Buliara isn't here right now. She left for
<clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar <clr:ffff>some time ago.

I understand that you're a special <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff>, so
I'll let you through...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>But that doesn't mean you can do
whatever you want. You still need to
obey the rules!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>No, "voe." With a V!<sp:5:0:0> Bite your lower lip
when you say it! "Voe"!<sp:5:1:0>

It's important to know this, because <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff>
means "<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo.

<clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0a00><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>I have had to explain this so many times since I
became a guard...<sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_AfterChallenge:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>The idea of a <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff> walking around the
throne room would normally be
preposterous.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But I will allow you inside anytime. It is
what the chief wants, after all.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You...<sp:5:0:0>still don't get it, do you?
In that case...
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>OK, how about I show you how to do it
with my spear!<sp:5:0:0> It's "vo," not "bo"! Got it?!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I'll whack it into your thick skull with my
spear!<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Voe<clr:ffff> means "<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo!<sp:5:0:0>
Got it?!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wha— A voe?!<sp:5:0:0> Did you come here to
escape the sand shroud?!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, you've reached the entrance to
the Gerudo <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.

But I cannot allow any <clr:0000>voe <clr:ffff>to pass
through this door.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>It is against the law for young Gerudo to
interact with voe.

So hurry up and get out of here.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There is a custom—really more of a law—
that we Gerudo follow.

Young Gerudo are generally not allowed
to interact with <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff>.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Back again, are you? Well, I told you
before—no voe are allowed past this
point!<sp:5:1:0> Wait a second...
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Golden hair...<sp:5:0:0> Blue eyes...<sp:5:0:0> About the same height
as Lady Riju...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_PreChallenge02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're the <clr:0000>voe <clr:ffff>the chief gave special
permission to... <sp:5:0:0>Just past here is the
Gerudo <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>You may have the chief's favor, but that
doesn't mean you can do whatever you
want. You still need to obey the rules!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! You've never heard that word?<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Voe<clr:ffff> means "<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo.
Talk_PreChallenge03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Gerudo <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff> is beyond here...<sp:5:0:0>
It doesn't matter how many times you
ask—I won't open the door for a <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff>.
Between keeping watch for intruders and
checking on the interior of the shelter
with those <clr:0000>peepholes<clr:ffff>, I'm very busy.
So please stop bothering me.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What is a <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff> like you doing here?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Maybe you're looking to escape the
sand shroud? Well, beyond this point is
the Gerudo <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.
And no voe are allowed there.
Wait a second...

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Golden hair...<sp:5:0:0> Blue eyes...<sp:5:0:0> About the same height
as Lady Riju...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_PreDefense:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's the <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff> everyone's been talking
about...

If you've got business inside, you'd better
get it done now. Once the fighting kicks
off, this door won't open until it's safe.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Normally, voe aren't allowed to even set
foot within the walls of <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>...

But this is a unique situation...


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>So as long as you keep out of the <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>,
I'll overlook your presence in town.

If you're looking for some place to get out
of the sand shroud, you can rest in one of
the houses on the surface.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're the voe everyone's been talking
about, aren't you?<sp:5:0:0>

Lady Riju let us know that you have her
permission to enter the <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You're even allowed to visit the shops and
use things in town.<sp:5:0:0> You must quite the
special voe...
Talk_PreChallenge04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just past here is the Gerudo <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0901>You may have the chief's favor, but that
doesn't mean you can do whatever you
want. You still need to obey the rules!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>It's you! <sp:5:1:0>You're the voe everyone's been
talking about?!<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Lady Riju let us know that you have her
permission to enter the <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff>.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>You're even allowed to visit the shops and
use things in town.<sp:5:0:0> You must be quite the
special voe...
Talk_PreChallenge05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What? Hurry up and get moving, already.<sp:5:0:0>
Geez... Are all <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff> as slow as you?
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>There's nothing to worry about.<sp:5:0:0> The voe
is very short and can't even reach the
<clr:0000>peepholes<clr:ffff> in the door.
He's out of sight, and even on his tiptoes,
he won't be able to see in.
Talk_PreChallenge06:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You should know this! "<clr:0000>Voe<clr:ffff>" means
"<clr:0000>man<clr:ffff>" in Gerudo.

Maybe you need to write it down?
Talk_AfterDefense:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You fought well against the Gibdos.


I'm glad you're all right. It would have
been unacceptable for an important guest
of Lady Riju, even a <clr:0000>voe<clr:ffff>, to be injured.
You may pass through here. Get some
rest, and recover after such a fierce
battle.
Talk_AfterChallenge_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I hope that you will continue to be a good
friend to the chief...<sp:5:0:0>and to all of the
Gerudo as well!
